channel.title: News on First Baptist Church Muncie
channel.description: Recent content in News on First Baptist Church Muncie

item.title: November Visitor
item.description: The November Visitor is available online.

item.title: Church Business Meeting
item.description: We are learning how to function in different ways this year.

item.title: Church Library
item.description: The church library is available for use and open to our members and their families.

item.title: Updates From Outreach
item.description: World Mission Offering This year our World Mission offerings were $460.

item.title: Visitor Articles
item.description: If you would like an announcement in the January Visitor, please email it to Wade by Sunday, December 13.

item.title: Christmas Gifts for Staff
item.description: While we will not be able to do a live presentation of gifts, we are planning to present Christmas gifts to our church staff.

item.title: Holiday Service Plans
item.description: Because of Covid 19 and difficulties in social distancing in a crowded sanctuary, First Baptist Church will not host its traditional live Christmas Eve service this year.

item.title: Facebook Live Prayer Time
item.description: During this season of social distancing, we continue a weekly Facebook Live prayer time!

item.title: YouTube Channel
item.description: If you are not able to make it in person to church, you can join us online each Sunday.
